flat.content: Statistics about the cells mapped to the comparison groups. Columns:

items: _Group: The group name in the comparison, or null, if cells are not mapped to any group
TotalCells: The total number of cells. This number should be the same for all groups
CellsPerGroup: The number of cells in the mapped group
AvailCellsPerGroup: The number of cells with CDR3 length between 12 and 17 for each group. These cells are used for the analysis
AvailCellsPct: The percentage of AvailCellsPerGroup over CellsPerGroup

flat.content: Estimated coefficients for each feature and position in the CDR3

flat.descr: Hydrophobicity values are averaged over the CDR3 for each TCR and then scaled to have a mean of 0 and a variance of 1. Horizontal lines depict the mean for each population
